text: Hey everyone does anyone know if it’s possible to redirect / hard URL change of url to a language based upon the IP of the user? I understand smart modules a bit but this was more for the whole page/site
You can do this in javascript in a module with hubl
Is there a way to do translations of staged pages yet?
Where can i find the ID of an advanced menu?
If you go into the menu editor it will be in the URL
The navigation page inside settings? Is it a 10 digit ID?
the longest … the shorter one is the portal id
You should see the number change as you select different menus

Hi. I would like to have a different text (different languages) in the cookie bar from HubSpot. I've seen that we can add different cookie settings and select the different paths. So one version with a text in german for the path /de/, one for english, one for spanish etc. My question is: is the cookie globally saved? or must I accept for every language?
is there a general email channel?

i have seen this several times.  wondering if anyone at HubSpot is pursuing a fix or if there is something i am missing.  If a user adds cta through the rich text editor in an email, the cta is clipped.  This is for an email template
you don't need a channel but a <@U7SL518D6> :grin:
the problem is that this isnt my code, this is the insert cta option in the rich text editor
it has never taken jon this long to respond
well, has been really long I don't manage emails, but I remember you can add some CSS and then force it to be inlined by HS
so its could be related with the IMG styles
hmmmm.  no other images have issues
Have not seen that issue before but would give a look if you dm me a preview url
I will be a little slow currently out to lunch

did you tried the new email d&d beta?
My team use it all the time and I didn't heard any email issue anymore since then
we have some clients using it.  it is a little limiting at times
yeah well, we impose/inherit those limitations to the client too :face_with_rolling_eyes:
i think i just figured it out
the cta is wrapped in a p tag
and i have a line-height set for p tags that is inline
<@U7SL518D6>, do you set a line-height for your <p>'s?
_jon slowly chews on a meatball parm sandwich_
u have a really weird sandwich culture
I had to google that kind of sandwich cos I couldn't imagine at all
seems a bit complicated to eat
if you cant find one, meet me in NYC in an hour
and i will buy one for you
I don't think I can arrive on time, tho I will have in mind for this inbound in Boston, hope I can find there :smile:
and i will even buy it for you
```In the early 1990s, a marketing fad called the Clear Craze equated clarity with purity.```
that purity thing, makes me think that I need to find a dealer to buy some _crystal pepsi_
i have a feeling jon is a good hookup
have to confess I am one of those weirdos, I am not into pepsi nor coca cola :eyes:
but find me a good root beer
and i we will be friends for life
:point_up_2: that sounds good. I am going to start to take notes about things I need to taste there :smile:
I am from Spain, living in UK tho
Those are two completely different cultures.
so while I had pretty clear about the #nobrexit stuff, the last european facepalm law #noMemes makes you think
I don't have that sandwich bagage
didnt move to the UK for the food
My wife's family are Colombian, but many live all over Europe
well, I have meatball but not in bread you weirdos
although, you can dip bread there :joy:
u have ur shit together Chad, I like it :+1:
literally ate that for lunch yesterday, amamzing
did we just replace the channel with this thread?
London is much more cosmopolitan u know
I will check next time I am there :+1:
Report back with gifs and memes
I will maybe need a US VPN if there is #nobrexit :matrix:
looks like you have some parm options
reserving a table for you now at frankie and benny's
:runner: I will run to there so I can make it double
This is making me freakin hungry
cancel that.  they have a vegan burger
u know, everything is about to keep the balance: *gym & ñam* (or yum in EN but doesn't have that rithm as in spanish)
we just dont use the word "gym" here
is it hidden with the _pure crystal_?
anything that implies sweat might be possible is against the rules in Murica
Unless your eating a Meatball Sub
true meat sweats are an exception
yeah.  that is a quality workout
well, then weather in my city of birth (Córdoba) should be 100% forbidden (summers are like over 40º all day long)
I’m just imagining someone from HubSpot’s higher positions looking in here and going “why do we have the developer slack again? looks like it’s just where people go to discuss food and post gifs”
Eh hem,.. this is a sidebar and this is called Community!
it’s starting to sound like community champions involves an eating contest
I’m super excited for that sippy cup
they sent me last year a couple bags only...
we can bring them to boston and sip together
awesome glad you got the bags gonzalo
yeah,  Luke sent me with a nice card
yes a cold Porter and some Shell fish
tho, I wanted a cup! I explicited asked for it! because I couldn't order one in the other community stars thing
was wondering how you get into that hubstars
I now have an in that club lol
I just got a random invitation because I was active on the forum community like two years ago or so
and it was hard for me, cos most of it was inbound and marketer challenges u know
so I did the effort for that cup
well i see jon already asked
I like the community champions door a little better
bet the stars cup is bigger

there were like challenges to get points. Those challenges were most related with:
Share your office, make a selfie with something HubSpot orange color and things like that...
community champions is like - welcome to your new internship
we were litterally talking the other day about needing a nomination process, and that a few of us would nominate you
at least, I joined today the gallery thing
I mean, apart of this pretty face
you’re not always on but when you are you’re helpful to people. You also made the :dark_sunglasses:  dark theme
as a reward for being inducted into the community champions, you will be mailed a meatball parm
hahaha, wonder how well the meatball parm will ship
will make sure it comes out of the boston office and not dublin
they say that a meatball parm is better after two weeks in various climates
better include a heatlamp in the packaging
the more old cheese, the better right?
oh yes, I taste regulary our aged dried pork from Spain
Jamón is one of the best pleasures u can have
see the thing is Gonzalo aged anything when followed by Spain, Italy, Greece, or France, automatically magically sounds better than anything aged followed by America
if it comes from america and it’s aged, you assume by the time it gets to you, you will somehow have gained weight
before it gets to you even
and the gut was not built to process american cheese
so it just stays in there

Is it possible to clone pages (not templates) across portals? We built a whole bunch of stuff in an existing portal and then decided to just buy an entirely separate portal for it. So while I know we can transfer over the templates, do I just have to manually recreate each page?
truly a great discussion on the pitfalls of email clients
My dinner was pathetic in comparison..
I assume <@U7ADCU3BM> is in a nice meatball parm coma right about now
Not a meatball parm but it'll do

Say I wanted to to do this like site wide, so when you land on the homepage I redirect to the translated page of your region by knowing your locale from an IP? Is there something within HubSpot to check this Ip to return a region?
i have built sites where there are multiple languages
and i used custom modules for the menus and languagey parts
Haha, that actually looks pretty yummy
